statements: SELECT show_title, air_time, air_date FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY air_time DESC;
SELECT show_id, show_title FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_date >= '2022-01-15' AND air_date <= '2022-01-20';
SELECT show_title, air_time FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_date = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM TVShowSchedule ORDER BY air_date ASC, air_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY air_time DESC;
SELECT show_title, air_time FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_time BETWEEN '18:00:00' AND '21:00:00';
SELECT show_title, air_date FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY air_date;
SELECT * FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE air_time <= '12:00:00' OR show_title LIKE '%News%';
SELECT show_title, air_date FROM TVShowSchedule WHERE show_title IN ('Game of Thrones', 'The Mandalorian') ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Shows;
SELECT show_id, show_name, genre FROM Shows ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT episode_id, episode_name, season, episode_number FROM Episodes WHERE season = 1;
SELECT * FROM Shows WHERE channel = 'ABC' AND air_day = 'Monday';
SELECT show_name, air_time FROM Shows WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT * FROM Shows WHERE genre = 'Drama';
SELECT show_name, air_day FROM Shows WHERE channel = 'HBO' ORDER BY show_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, episode_name FROM Shows JOIN Episodes ON Shows.show_id = Episodes.show_id WHERE Episodes.season = 1 AND Episodes.episode_number = 1;
SELECT show_name, genre, air_time FROM Shows WHERE air_day = 'Monday' AND genre IN ('Comedy', 'Drama') ORDER BY air_time;
SELECT episode_name, air_date FROM Episodes WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01' AND season = 3;
SELECT * FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT show_name, air_time FROM TV_Shows WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT channel_name, country FROM TV_Channels ORDER BY channel_id DESC;
SELECT cast_name, role FROM Cast_Members WHERE show_id = 2 ORDER BY cast_id ASC;
SELECT show_name, air_date FROM TV_Shows WHERE air_date > '2022-01-01' AND air_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TV_Shows;
SELECT show_name, air_time FROM TV_Shows WHERE air_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, air_time, air_date FROM TV_Shows ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT Cast_Members.cast_name, Cast_Members.role, TV_Shows.show_name FROM Cast_Members INNER JOIN TV_Shows ON Cast_Members.show_id = TV_Shows.show_id;
SELECT TV_Shows.show_name, TV_Channels.channel_name FROM TV_Shows INNER JOIN TV_Channels ON TV_Shows.show_id = TV_Channels.channel_id;
SELECT * FROM TV_Show;
SELECT show_name, air_time FROM TV_Show ORDER BY air_time ASC;
SELECT show_name, air_date FROM TV_Show WHERE air_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, channel_name FROM TV_Show JOIN Schedule ON TV_Show.show_id = Schedule.show_id JOIN Channel ON Schedule.channel_id = Channel.channel_id;
SELECT show_name, channel_name FROM TV_Show JOIN Schedule ON TV_Show.show_id = Schedule.show_id JOIN Channel ON Schedule.channel_id = Channel.channel_id WHERE Schedule.schedule_date = '2022-08-20';
SELECT * FROM TV_Show;
SELECT show_name, air_date FROM TV_Show WHERE air_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT channel_name, channel_number FROM Channel WHERE channel_id = 3;
SELECT u.user_id, u.show_name, s.schedule_date FROM User_Watchlist u JOIN Schedule s ON u.show_id = s.show_id;
SELECT s.schedule_id, t.show_name, c.channel_name FROM Schedule s JOIN TV_Show t ON s.show_id = t.show_id JOIN Channel c ON s.channel_id = c.channel_id ORDER BY s.schedule_date DESC, t.show_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows;
SELECT show_name, air_day FROM tv_shows WHERE air_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT channel_name, channel_number FROM channels ORDER BY channel_number DESC;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_name LIKE '%Comedy%';
SELECT episode_name, season_number FROM episodes WHERE episode_number <= 5;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows;
SELECT show_name, air_day FROM tv_shows WHERE air_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT channel_name, channel_number FROM channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT episode_name, season_number, episode_number FROM episodes WHERE season_number = 1 ORDER BY episode_number ASC;
